fields.description:
isAngularCompileHeaders was referenced in 14.x, but looks like uses of this was removed in 15,x

As such, angularCompileHeaders doens't appear to do anything. Further, we don't actually have any examples using angularCompileHeaders, which may be why this wasn't found earlier
